Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the pre-season opener for both teams
The game was played in Montreal at the Bell Centre
Chris Boucher led the Raptors with 13 points and 6 rebounds
R.J. Barrett led all scorers with 17 points before leaving the game with a shoulder injury
Others: The game was part of the Raptors' 30th anniversary season
The Raptors will visit the Wizards in a rematch on Friday
The Raptors will wrap up the pre-season against the Nets in Brooklyn on Oct. 18
The Raptors tip off their regular season at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Oct. 23
